item.title: Recursive SQL query goodness
item.description: So this week I’m looking into resursive SQL queries. And my goa? To saturate the CPU with that ðŸ˜€ So normally you’d want to make your query fast and avoid O(n^2) queries as much as possible, but now I’m doing the opposite and make it use as much CPU as possible. Kinda awesome you get to do that for a school project isn’t it!
